title: (x) ID - Art Nouveau/Victorian/Storybook/Organic - Columbian aka Burton's Nightmare aka Goodfellow {Nick Curtis, Mike Y}
content:
Here's a font I've seen before and probably even have on my hd, but i can't figure out what it is. Any ideas? It's all about the "g".

Thanks all,  
Scott

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820090708im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VintageB_5133.png)
author: sdaris

comments.content: It's an old Cleveland Type Foundry face called Columbian; there's a freeware version out there called Burton's Nightmare, or something like that...
Nick is right - check Dafont for Burton's Nightmare

Scriptoprium has it as [Goodfellow](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820090708/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/goodfellow/).

- Mike Yanega
